name: CLUCI Crossbody Bags for Women Cross Body Bag for Woman Sling Bag for Women Leather Trendy Large Sling Backpack Travel Crossbody Bag for Women Beige with Brown
reviews: I‚Äôm using this as a mini diaper bag/my purse! I hate lugging around a huge diaper bag that isn‚Äôt needed for my toddler, but my small purse wasn‚Äôt big enough to fit his essentials in. So I‚Äôd have two bags with me when out.It surprised me how much it fits! In the pics I have two whopping size 6 pampers, a pack of wipes, pair of spare 2t pants, and a little toy car in the main compartment. Or I can fit his stainless steel water bottle in there and a really small refillable pack of wipes instead. The small zipper pocket in the main compartment holds my change and a few packs of gummies. The second compartment holds my cash, wallet for cards, earbuds, hand sanitizing wipe packs, and has room for more- could easily fit sunglasses and a granola bar in there too. The small front pocket holds masacara, eyeliner, chapstick,& hair clips. There is a wide zipper pocket on the back of the bag that will be perfect for passports when traveling too!I keep spare clothes, diapers, wipes in my car and his regular diaper bag packed for when he‚Äôs dropped off with the grandparents, but just for day to day outings to the store or etc this is so much nicer and more practical for me to use than the big diaper bag.My dislike- First thing I noticed was the strap on this was different colored than the picture Amazon has. See pictures I attached. In their picture the colors are faded/muted, which I really liked, but the actual product has bright vivid colors on the strap instead. Not a deal breaker, but worth mentioning. I would much rather the colors be true to the one in the pics listed.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2024
